meanings.definition: An act of adjusting or repairing a machine or vehicle to improve its performance.
meanings.sent1: I took my car for tuneups to make it run better.
meanings.sent2: Regular tuneups can help prevent breakdowns in the future.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic joked that my car needed tuneups more often than he did.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail during tuneups was like giving the car a spa day.
meanings.sent5: The tuneups transformed the old car into a smooth-running machine.

meanings.definition: A series of adjustments made to a musical instrument to ensure it is playing correctly.
meanings.sent1: The piano tuner performed tuneups on all the keys.
meanings.sent2: Musicians rely on regular tuneups to keep their instruments in top condition.
meanings.sent3: During the tuneups, the guitar suddenly started playing rock music on its own!
meanings.sent4: The tuneups on the violin strings created a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: After the tuneups, the flute sounded as clear as a bird's song.
